title: Edge Amazon API Gateway with a custom domain
description: Edge Amazon API Gateway custom domain with AWS SAM: certificate in us-east-1 when using another region

introBox.headline: How it works
text: To deploy an Edge API Gateway, it's mandatory to generate a certificate in us-east-1. Resources in one stack are deployed in a single region. You are not able to set another Region for a specific resource.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
Delete the stack: sam delete --stack-name sample-api --region eu-west-1
Delete the stack cert: sam delete --stack-name cert-sample-api --region us-east-1.
